01126     OutputManager<Input,Output,State>* p_om; 
01127     State test_state; 
01128     Input* p_in; 
01129     Output out; 
01130     int choice, 
01131       sub_choice; 
01132   };
01133 }; // end namespace easylocal
01134 
01135 #endif // define __EASYLOCAL_H
